00001 module cmfd_power_solver
00002 
00003   use cmfd_loss_operator, only: loss_operator,init_M_operator,                 &
00004  &                        build_loss_matrix,destroy_M_operator
00005   use cmfd_prod_operator, only: prod_operator,init_F_operator,                 &
00006  &                        build_prod_matrix,destroy_F_operator
00007 
00008   implicit none
00009   private
00010   public :: cmfd_power_execute 
00011 
00012 #include <finclude/petsc.h90>
00013 
00014   type(loss_operator) :: loss
00015   type(prod_operator) :: prod
00016 
00017   Vec         :: phi_n      ! new flux eigenvector
00018   Vec         :: phi_o      ! old flux eigenvector
00019   Vec         :: S_n        ! new source vector
00020   Vec         :: S_o        ! old source vector
00021   KSP         :: krylov     ! krylov solver
00022   PC          :: prec       ! preconditioner for krylov
00023   integer     :: ierr       ! error flag
00024   real(8)     :: k_n        ! new k-eigenvalue
00025   real(8)     :: k_o        ! old k-eigenvalue
00026   logical     :: iconv      ! did the problem converged
00027 
00028 contains
00029 
00030 !===============================================================================
00031 ! CMFD_POWER_EXECUTE
00032 !===============================================================================
00033 
00034   subroutine cmfd_power_execute()
00035 
00036     ! initialize solver
00037     call init_solver()
00038 
00039     ! initialize matrices and vectors
00040     call init_data()
00041 
00042     ! set up M loss matrix
00043     call build_loss_matrix(loss) 
00044 
00045     ! set up F production matrix
00046     call build_prod_matrix(prod)
00047 
00048     ! set up krylov info
00049     call KSPSetOperators(krylov, loss%M, loss%M, SAME_NONZERO_PATTERN, ierr)
00050     call KSPSetUp(krylov,ierr)
00051 
00052     ! calculate preconditioner (ILU)
00053     call PCFactorGetMatrix(prec,loss%M,ierr)
00054 
00055     ! begin power iteration 
00056     call execute_power_iter()
00057 
00058     ! extract results
00059     call extract_results()
00060 
00061     ! deallocate petsc objects
00062     call finalize()
00063 
00064   end subroutine cmfd_power_execute
00065 
00066 !===============================================================================
00067 ! INIT_DATA allocates matrices vectors for CMFD solution
00068 !===============================================================================
00069 
00070   subroutine init_data()
00071 
00072     integer :: n      ! problem size
00073     real(8) :: guess  ! initial guess
00074 
00075     ! set up matrices
00076     call init_M_operator(loss)
00077     call init_F_operator(prod)
00078 
00079     ! get problem size
00080     n = loss%n
00081 
00082     ! set up flux vectors
00083     call VecCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF,phi_n,ierr)
00084     call VecSetSizes(phi_n,PETSC_DECIDE,n,ierr)
00085     call VecSetFromOptions(phi_n,ierr)
00086     call VecCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF,phi_o,ierr)
00087     call VecSetSizes(phi_o,PETSC_DECIDE,n,ierr)
00088     call VecSetFromOptions(phi_o,ierr)
00089 
00090     ! set up source vectors
00091     call VecCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF,S_n,ierr)
00092     call VecSetSizes(S_n,PETSC_DECIDE,n,ierr)
00093     call VecSetFromOptions(S_n,ierr)
00094     call VecCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF,S_o,ierr)
00095     call VecSetSizes(S_o,PETSC_DECIDE,n,ierr)
00096     call VecSetFromOptions(S_o,ierr)
00097 
00098     ! set initial guess
00099     guess = 1.0_8 
00100     call VecSet(phi_n,guess,ierr)
00101     call VecSet(phi_o,guess,ierr)
00102     k_n = guess
00103     k_o = guess
00104 
00105   end subroutine init_data
00106 
00107 !===============================================================================
00108 ! INIT_SOLVER
00109 !===============================================================================
00110 
00111   subroutine init_solver()
00112 
00113     real(8)     :: solvertol ! krylov tolerance
00114 
00115     ! set tolerance
00116     solvertol = 1.0e-7_8
00117 
00118     ! set up krylov solver
00119     call KSPCreate(PETSC_COMM_SELF,krylov,ierr)
00120     call KSPSetTolerances(krylov,solvertol,PETSC_DEFAULT_DOUBLE_PRECISION,     &
00121    &                      PETSC_DEFAULT_DOUBLE_PRECISION,                      &
00122    &                      PETSC_DEFAULT_INTEGER,ierr)
00123     call KSPSetType(krylov,KSPGMRES,ierr)
00124     call KSPSetInitialGuessNonzero(krylov,PETSC_TRUE,ierr)
00125     call KSPSetInitialGuessNonzero(krylov,PETSC_TRUE,ierr)
00126     call KSPGetPC(krylov,prec,ierr)
00127     call PCSetType(prec,PCILU,ierr)
00128     call PCFactorSetLevels(prec,5,ierr)
00129     call KSPSetFromOptions(krylov,ierr)
00130 
00131   end subroutine init_solver
00132 
00133 !===============================================================================
00134 ! EXECUTE_POWER_ITER  in the main power iteration routine 
00135 !                     for the cmfd calculation
00136 !===============================================================================
00137 
00138   subroutine execute_power_iter()
00139 
00140     real(8)     :: num       ! numerator for eigenvalue update
00141     real(8)     :: den       ! denominator for eigenvalue update
00142     real(8)     :: one=1.0_8 ! one
00143     integer     :: i         ! iteration counter
00144 
00145     ! reset convergence flag
00146     iconv = .FALSE.
00147 
00148     ! begin power iteration
00149     do i = 1,10000
00150 
00151       ! compute source vector
00152       call MatMult(prod%F,phi_o,S_o,ierr)
00153 
00154       ! normalize source vector
00155       call VecScale(S_o,one/k_o,ierr)
00156 
00157       ! compute new flux vector
00158       call KSPSolve(krylov,S_o,phi_n,ierr)
00159 
00160       ! compute new source vector
00161       call MatMult(prod%F,phi_n,S_n,ierr)
00162 
00163       ! compute new k-eigenvalue
00164       call VecSum(S_n,num,ierr)
00165       call VecSum(S_o,den,ierr)
00166       k_n = num/den
00167 
00168       ! renormalize the old source
00169       call VecScale(S_o,k_o,ierr)
00170 
00171       ! check convergence
00172       call convergence()
00173 
00174       ! to break or not to break
00175       if (iconv) exit
00176 
00177       ! record old values
00178       call VecCopy(phi_n,phi_o,ierr)
00179       k_o = k_n
00180 
00181     end do
00182 
00183   end subroutine execute_power_iter 
00184 
00185 !===============================================================================
00186 ! CONVERGENCE checks the convergence of eigenvalue, eigenvector and source
00187 !===============================================================================
00188 
00189   subroutine convergence()
00190 
00191     real(8)     :: ktol = 1.e-6_8 ! tolerance on keff
00192     real(8)     :: stol = 1.e-5_8 ! tolerance on source
00193     real(8)     :: kerr           ! error in keff
00194     real(8)     :: serr           ! error in source
00195     real(8)     :: one = -1.0_8   ! one
00196     real(8)     :: norm_n         ! L2 norm of new source
00197     real(8)     :: norm_o         ! L2 norm of old source
00198     integer     :: floc           ! location of max error in flux
00199     integer     :: sloc           ! location of max error in source
00200     integer     :: ierr           ! petsc error code
00201     integer     :: n              ! vector size
00202 
00203     ! reset convergence flag
00204     iconv = .FALSE.
00205 
00206     ! calculate error in keff
00207     kerr = abs(k_o - k_n)/k_n
00208 
00209     ! calculate max error in source
00210     call VecNorm(S_n,NORM_2,norm_n,ierr)
00211     call VecNorm(S_o,NORM_2,norm_o,ierr)
00212     serr = abs(norm_n-norm_o)/norm_n
00213 
00214     ! check for convergence
00215     if(kerr < ktol .and. serr < stol) iconv = .TRUE.
00216 
00217     ! print out to user (TODO: make formatted)
00218 !   print *,k_n,kerr,serr
00219 
00220   end subroutine convergence
00221 
00222 !==============================================================================
00223 ! EXTRACT_RESULTS
00224 !==============================================================================
00225 
00226   subroutine extract_results()
00227 
00228     use global
00229 
00230     PetscViewer :: viewer
00231     PetscScalar, pointer :: phi_v(:) ! pointer to eigenvector info
00232     integer :: n ! problem size
00233 
00234     ! get problem size
00235     n = loss%n
00236 
00237     ! also allocate in cmfd object
00238     if (.not. allocated(cmfd%phi)) allocate(cmfd%phi(n))
00239 
00240     ! convert petsc phi_object to cmfd_obj
00241     call VecGetArrayF90(phi_n,phi_v,ierr)
00242     cmfd%phi = phi_v
00243 
00244     call VecRestoreArrayF90(phi_n,phi_v,ierr)
00245 
00246     ! save eigenvalue
00247     cmfd%keff = k_n
00248 
00249     ! write out results
00250     call PetscViewerBinaryOpen(PETSC_COMM_SELF,'fluxvec.bin' &
00251    &     ,FILE_MODE_WRITE,viewer,ierr)
00252     call VecView(phi_n,viewer,ierr)
00253     call PetscViewerDestroy(viewer,ierr)
00254 
00255   end subroutine extract_results
00256 
00257 !==============================================================================
00258 ! FINALIZE
00259 !==============================================================================
00260 
00261   subroutine finalize()
00262 
00263     ! finalize data objects
00264     call destroy_M_operator(loss)
00265     call destroy_F_operator(prod)
00266 
00267     call VecDestroy(phi_n,ierr)
00268     call VecDestroy(phi_o,ierr)
00269     call VecDestroy(S_n,ierr)
00270     call VecDestroy(S_o,ierr)
00271 
00272     ! finalize solver objects
00273 !   call KSPDestroy(krylov,ierr)
00274 
00275   end subroutine finalize
00276 
00277 end module cmfd_power_solver
